# zitadel_action_execution_event (Data Source)

Datasource representing an action execution triggered by an event.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "zitadel_action_execution_event" "default" {
	id = "event:user.human.added"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource. Must be set to the condition, e.g. `event:user.human.added`, `group:user.human`, or `all`/`all:`

### Read-Only

- `all` (Boolean) Trigger on all events.
- `event` (String) The specific event to trigger on.
- `group` (String) The event group to trigger on.
- `target_ids` (List of String) The list of target IDs to call.
